channel.title: data preparation on My journey from Data Analyst to Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in data preparation on My journey from Data Analyst to Data Science

item.title: Mastering Data Preparation with Pandas: Subetting, Filtering and Joining DataFrames
item.description: When I started working with pandas I noticed that there were so many ways how to subset, filter and join data with pandas. But I was lacking a systematic overview. How do the different approaches differ and when to use which?
